text: Pus shayad kay aap iss wahee kay kissi hissay ko chor deney walay hain jo aap ki taraf nazil ki jati hai aur iss say aap ka dil tang hai sirf inn ki iss baat per kay iss per koi khazana kiyon nahi utra? Ya iss kay sath koi farishta hi aata sunn lijiye! Aap to sirf daraney walay hi hain aur her cheez ka zimmay daar Allah Taalaa hai
